title: Our Dumb Apocalypse, Best Movie/TV/Games So Far 2022 07.05.22
itunes:title: Our Dumb Apocalypse, Best Movie/TV/Games So Far 2022 07.05.22
description:
In episode 1280, Jack and guest co-host DJ Danl Goodman are joined by streamer and co-host of Boss LVL, Psyche, to discuss... Water Wars Come to the Suburbs, Republicans Get Google’s Permission to SPAM the Hell Out of You, It Is The Midpoint So Let’s Do a Year So Far In Culture In Review and more!

  1. Water Wars Come to the Suburbs
  2. Republicans Get Google’s Permission to SPAM the Hell Out of You
  3. Is Gmail ‘Actively Suppressing’ Emails from Republicans?
  4. Gmail isn't biased against Republicans. They're just bad at sending emails.
  5. Google is trying to keep political campaign emails out of Gmail spam folders

Pschye's Twitch Stream: https://www.twitch.tv/psyche

LISTEN: Jungle by Fred Again

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
